casebody.data:
EVOLUTIONARY INTELLIGENCE LLC, petitioner,
v.
SPRINT NEXTEL CORPORATION, et al. No. 17-609. Supreme Court of the United States Dec. 4, 2017.

Motion of U.S. Inventors Group for leave to file a brief as amici curiae granted. Motion of Eagle Forum Educational & Legal Defense Fund for leave to file a brief as amici curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States *522Court of Appeals for the Federal Circuit denied.
